meaningMnemonic: When you have <kanji>mercy</kanji> upon those you <kanji>love</kanji> it's called <vocabulary>affection</vocabulary>. You end up doing things out of the <vocabulary>kindness</vocabulary> of your heart because they mean a lot to you.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
